name: BlobDobBoing
description:
Made with MicroStudio (https://microstudio.dev)!

Simple platformer based on idea from the classic 1983 Namco Japan "Mappy" games on Amiga and in the Arcade Halls of Oldy Time. Sigh, so many quarters used up on that......

Using a modified (fixed some issues and added features) version of QuickEngine by user @gilles. See: https://microstudio.dev/i/gilles/quickengine/
